Ciencias.GUI

Class TextRenderingAssist

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ciencias.GUI.TextRenderingAssist

  • public class TextRenderingAssist
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for Strings to ensure they display and otherwise behave properly.
    Version:
    3/16/2014
    Author:
    Paul Alves

    • Method Detail

      • prepareText

        public static java.lang.String prepareText(java.lang.String pText,
                           int breakPoint)
        Prepares text for the renderer by separating the text with line breaks.
        Parameters:
        pText - The text to prepare
        breakPoint - How many characters in to create breakpoints.
        Returns:
        The prepared text

      • testForBadCharacters

        public static int testForBadCharacters(java.lang.String text)
        Tests if a string is unsuitable for a file name
        Parameters:
        text - The string to test
        Returns:
        1 If the string is invalid for a file name. 0 otherwise
